author: Last updated
title: New Year Coloring Cards for Young Learners | Teaching Resources
text:
Welcome pupils back after the winter break with this calm and creative New Year coloring cards resource, designed especially for early years and young learners.
This printable pack includes color-in greeting cards that help children settle back into the classroom routine through quiet, engaging, and purposeful activity. Each page contains four cards, making them quick to prepare and easy to distribute as a welcome-back gift.
All designs are black and white to support low-cost printing and encourage creativity while developing fine motor skills.
What is Included
Printable New Year coloring greeting cards
Four cards per page for easy cutting
Child-friendly illustrations suitable for early years
Black and white format for economical printing
Why Choose This Resource
Saves valuable planning and preparation time
Helps children relax and refocus after the holiday break
Encourages creativity, coloring, and fine motor development
Ideal for classroom, home learning, and early years settings
Recommended Use
First day back after the winter holidays
Morning work or calm transition activity
Welcome-back classroom gifts
Early years and home learning activities
This simple yet effective New Year activity creates a positive classroom atmosphere while keeping young learners engaged and calm.
How can I reuse this?
